metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Basilisk GateOne of the Flaming Fists.Please rename to Fist Olloa.

0.speaker: Fist Olloa
0.text: The day of the big tin toys is over. Back to keeping order the old-fashioned way, with a boot and a truncheon.

1.speaker: Fist Olloa
1.text: If all these folks can just keep their shit together, maybe nobody else will get hurt. Maybe.
